Articles.Content:
How do I use it?  It says on Curse to use it that I should "add either the AR202 surface-attached case from the Control tab or the MechJeb pod from the Pods tab to one of your vessels."  

I'm in career mode and have gone 3 steps into the tech tree (all 3 columns before the 45 point stuff), but I'm not seeing these components in my warehouse.  And I'm not seeing any way to access menus while rocketing.  I was able to get KER to work a bit, although it seemed to stop working on missions (the button with yellow/black stopped responding).  I removed KER and tried to get Mechjob2 to work, but no dice.

Any tips?  I feel like I'm missing something obvious.  Is it not for career mode?

 

Thanks!
You should delete this post. You have duplicates.
would if I could... can't see how to do it
